Metadata: This series of short publications, developed by Oregon Sea Grant's watershed education and outreach team, lays out guidelines for choosing, building, maintaining and testing a variety of "green" options for handling stormwater runoff from residential, commercial, and public property. The series includes "Rain Gardens," ORESU-G-11-001; "Porous Pavement," ORESU-G-11-002; "Vegetated Filter Strips," ORESU-G-11-003; "Drywells," ORESU-G-11-004; "Stormwater Planters," ORESU-G-11-005; "Swales," ORESU-G-11-006; "Green Roofs," ORESU-G-11-007; "Infiltration Testing," ORESU-G-11-008; and "Soakage Trenches," ORESU-G-11-009.
